title: LFT Gold III Jungle Main
body: Looking to join a semi-serious ranked team, I play can play Yi, Nocturne, Maokai, Sej, Kha'zix and Wukong, I am willing to learn new champs if required.

replies.body: Hi please have a look at http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/xWNEFfMK-tactical-gaming-tg-is-looking-for-you-with-coaching. if you are interested please drop an application and use me as a referral. TG Atlas. We are looking for someone around your elo for one of our teams!

Yo so I main reksai, Riven and lee sin. My main role is jungle. I would love to join either of the teams dude it will be great to play in a team which is aiming high. I can help the team achieve those aims. My reksai win rate is 64% (62 wins and 34 losses) and I mostly play lee in normals not in ranked due to the fact that he is only strong with certain comps at least in my opinion. I could also point out the things that need improvement or things that they need to try and avoid for example when I play with my friends I always notice those little mistakes that make big difference in their gameplay like riven not AA between Q s etc. I am currently gold 2 and was gold 5 last season. It would be great to be part of any of your team.

Thanks for reading.
